participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Caring and community-oriented, Emma enjoys helping others and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, George loves to express himself through sewing and cherishes family moments.
participant_2.background: i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i'm retired and living the great life. i have amazing children and grandchildren.
